tool_description: Retrieves current inventory levels and stock information for specified products across warehouse locations.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs or IDs to check inventory levels for

warehouse_locations.description: Specific warehouse locations to check; if empty, checks all locations

error_messages: Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs do not exist in the system. Verify product IDs are correct.
Warehouse location not found: Invalid warehouse location specified. Use valid location codes.
Empty product list: At least one product ID must be provided.
usage: Provide an array of product IDs to check current inventory levels. Optionally specify warehouse locations to limit the search scope.

product_levels.description: Current inventory levels for each requested product
